components.title: How to Share Direct Links to PebbleGo Articles
components.videoDescription: Watch this video tutorial on sharing direct links to PebbleGo content
components.content:
@image ./assets/kids-with-computer.png

Step 1: Navigate within PebbleGo to the [b]category[/b] or [b]article[/b] you want to share.

Step 2: Click the [url=#testing_a_title]Tools and Settings[/url] gear in the upper right corner, then select the “Copy Link” button.

@image ./assets/sea-turtle.png

@title Testing a title

Step 3. Do something else

* Do this thing
* Do that thing
* Do another thing

You're finished!
